name: Forget Me
description:
Started as a university project. Further developed since and still under development.

Based on the story "Metamorphosis" from the book, SUM: 40 tales of the afterlife. The player is stuck in a limbo state until their name is spoken for the last time. The player must go back to all the areas they are remembered by someone, remove all items that remind others of them and then pass through the person to make them forget.
